title: Tyler Cowen on the COVID-19 Pandemic
description: Economist and infovore Tyler Cowen of George Mason University talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the political, social, and economic aspects of the COVID-19 pandemic.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
content:encoded: Economist and infovore Tyler Cowen of George Mason University talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the political, social, and economic aspects of the COVID-19 pandemic.
